Castillo De San Joaquín
Fort Winfield Scott
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: completed just before the American Civil War by the United States Army, to defend San Francisco Bay against hostile warships. Renamed Fort Winfield Scott, 1882; entered as a California Historic Landmark as Castillo De San Joaquín. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fort_Point_National_Historic_Site [work]
